body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? didn't test that, just saw it on opponent's side. Opponent plays Freyalise's Charm. I cast a black spell. Notification reads something like: "Freyalise's Charm: you may pay {1} to draw a card." Card text, though, reads: {G}{G} [...] draw a card.

This might be wrong twice:
1.) it's an activated ability, not a may prompt
2.) the cost is {G}{G} not {1}. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Freyalise's Charm: wrong notification?

comments.body:
It's wrong, but thankfully wrong once :)
Under the current Orcale, the charm is now a triggered may prompt whenever a black spell is cast by an opponent.

Thanks for catching that.

Fixed in Revision e9c2f0e493a0

**Status:** Fixed  
  **Owner:** ShawnieBoyUK
